alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Iron (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 1:53PM MDT until August 20 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Beaver County in southern Utah... North central Iron County in southern Utah... * Until 230 PM MDT * At 153 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 32 miles southwest of Milford, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Beaver and north central Iron Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
